attributes.action: Update property rights of cohabitees to accurately calculate financial pay outs.
attributes.background: There are more than 2 million unmarried couples living together in England.   In the majority of cases individuals will be unfairly compensated following the breakdown of the relationship.  Resulting in lower remuneration following the sale of the house.  Our current law is no longer fit for purpose

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you're concerned about the rights of people who are cohabiting, but we're not sure exactly what action you'd like to see.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
